visualization.name: Venn Diagram
visualization.description: Area proportional Venn and Euler Diagrams
visualization.help:
# What is the Venn Diagram Viewer?
This visualization lets you create area-proportional Venn and Euler diagrams using the [venn.js](https://github.com/benfred/venn.js) library.
After selecting a dataset, you can plot overlaps between different sets based on your selected observations.
## Key Features
- **Venn and Euler Diagrams**: Automatically draw diagrams based on your data. - **Area-Proportional**: Sizes of circles are proportional to set sizes and intersections. - **Simple Setup**: Choose your observations and generate the diagram easily.
This tool is ideal for visualizing relationships and overlaps between two or more groups.
To learn more about venn.js, visit: [https://github.com/benfred/venn.js](https://github.com/benfred/venn.js)
